title: scan-prioritize-agent detects and recommends blocking human actions
description: Enhance scan-prioritize-agent to analyze human-actions/ directory, detect when human actions are blocking critical bugs or features (P0/P1), and surface these blocking actions in the priority queue with recommendations to the user. This enables users to unblock automated workflows by addressing human interventions first.
user_impact: Improves workflow efficiency by surfacing critical blockers that require human intervention before automated work can proceed
